title: Refactor code to standardize replica assignment
description:
Today, we have different mechanisms to assign replicas to nodes

	the default
	rules based replica placement
	policy based replica placement



different commands such as add-replica, add shard, create collection etc uses different code paths to assign replicas to nodes. it should be refactored to unify all this into a single method, if possible
